SEARCH
Package game.items.consumable

Class PotOfGold

java.lang.Object
engine.GameEntity
engine.items.Item
game.items.consumable.PotOfGold
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable, Consumable, Sellable
public class PotOfGold extends Item implements Consumable, Sellable
This class represents a pot of gold in the game. This pot of gold can be picked up or dropped by the player. Pot of gold are represented by '$' on the game map.

    • consumeConsumable

      public String consumeConsumable(Actor actor)
      Consumes the consumable item, applying its effect to the actor. The item is then removed from the actor's inventory. It will add 10 credits to the actor's wallet
      Specified by:
      consumeConsumable in interface Consumable
      Parameters:
      actor - the actor consuming the item
      Returns:
      a special string

    • allowableActions

      public ActionList allowableActions(Actor owner)
      Returns a list of allowable actions that the consumable can perform to the current actor. In this case, a ConsumeAction to consume the consumable.
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class Item
      Parameters:
      owner - the owner of the consumable
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable list of Actions

    • sellItem

      public String sellItem(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Sells the PotOfGold. The PotOfGold is removed from the actor's inventory, and its selling price is normally added to the actor's balance. There is a 25% chance that the item is taken directly without payment.
      Specified by:
      sellItem in interface Sellable
      Parameters:
      actor - the actor selling the item
      map - the map of actor selling the item
      Returns:
      a String stating the result of the item's sale

    • allowableActions

      public ActionList allowableActions(Actor otherActor, Location location)
      List of allowable actions that the PotOfGold allows its owner do to other actor. Allows the owner to sell it to a trader.
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class Item
      Parameters:
      otherActor - the other actor (trader)
      location - the location of the other actor (trader)
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable list of Actions
